title: Dicer
summary: Role-playing game dice for your Android watch - D4, D6, D8, D10, D12 and D20
description: All the dice you need for a Dungeons & Dragons campaign on your Android Wear watch - D4, D6, D8, D10, D12 and D20. Slay monsters, cast spells and roll chances with a flick of your wrist.To use:1. Swipe left on your watch face to open the launcher2. Scroll to the app and tap "Dicer" to run it3. Flick up or down on the die image to change dice4. Shake your wrist (or tap on the die) to roll
descriptionHTML:
All the dice you need for a Dungeons & Dragons campaign on your Android Wear watch - D4, D6, D8, D10, D12 and D20. Slay monsters, cast spells and roll chances with a flick of your wrist.

To use:
1. Swipe left on your watch face to open the launcher
2. Scroll to the app and tap "Dicer" to run it
3. Flick up or down on the die image to change dice
4. Shake your wrist (or tap on the die) to roll
